entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
